00009 #ifndef BOOST_TT_IS_SCALAR_HPP_INCLUDED
00010 #define BOOST_TT_IS_SCALAR_HPP_INCLUDED
00011 
00012 #include "boost/type_traits/is_arithmetic.hpp"
00013 #include "boost/type_traits/is_enum.hpp"
00014 #include "boost/type_traits/is_pointer.hpp"
00015 #include "boost/type_traits/is_member_pointer.hpp"
00016 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/ice_or.hpp"
00017 #include "boost/config.hpp"
00018 
00019 // should be the last #include
00020 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_def.hpp"
00021 
00022 namespace boost {
00023 
00024 namespace detail {
00025 
00026 template <typename T>
00027 struct is_scalar_impl
00028 { 
00029    BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value =
00030       (::boost::type_traits::ice_or<
00031          ::boost::is_arithmetic<T>::value,
00032          ::boost::is_enum<T>::value,
00033          ::boost::is_pointer<T>::value,
00034          ::boost::is_member_pointer<T>::value
00035       >::value));
00036 };
00037 
00038 // these specializations are only really needed for compilers 
00039 // without partial specialization support:
00040 template <> struct is_scalar_impl<void>{ BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = false ); };
00041 #ifndef BOOST_NO_CV_VOID_SPECIALIZATIONS
00042 template <> struct is_scalar_impl<void const>{ BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = false ); };
00043 template <> struct is_scalar_impl<void volatile>{ BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = false ); };
00044 template <> struct is_scalar_impl<void const volatile>{ BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = false ); };
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 } // namespace detail
00048 
00049 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(is_scalar,T,::boost::detail::is_scalar_impl<T>::value)
00050 
00051 } // namespace boost
00052 
00053 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_undef.hpp"
00054 
00055 #endif // BOOST_TT_IS_SCALAR_HPP_INCLUDED
